Title: Carpet Diem
Writer: Alex Hirsch (creator), Timothy McKeon, Zach Paez, Alex Hirsch
Actors: Kristen Schaal, Jason Ritter, Alex Hirsch, Linda Cardellini
Plot: Dipper wants his own room and when Soos finds one in the shack, Stan makes Dipper and Mabel compete for it. Meanwhile, Dipper has found out that the shag rug inside let's you switch bodies with whomever you shock.
